title: Ocean Week Challenge Event + Twisted Treeline
body:
Is there any chance Twisted Treeline queue can be temporarily opened up all day/every day for this entire event?

TT is pretty much the only league i play these days and i would love to contribute more to this event
I'm sure many others feel the same way.

For anyone that doesn't know what challenge/event i'm talking about here's a link:
[Ocean Week Challenge](http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oceanweek/index.html#goals)

replies.body: Yeah, I don't think TT is updating points for the event, unless the event page is just lagging.
Hey peoples! You were right there was an error. We're pushing an update which includes TT as we speak. Apologies and thanks for the catch!
So does this mean Ill get my points from tt ?
I'm going to dig in and figure that out. I'll let you know!

Follow up question. If we got a win on twisted treeline before the IP boost is unlocked but didn't win any games on summoners rift, would we still receive the ip boosts? assuming we get the points for games won on twisted treeline before they were counting towards ocean week points. If not, would this be something we could submit a support ticket for?

Sorry for the delay... I fell asleep and slept for 14 hours - it's been a long but exciting week!

I'll have to look into this and get back to you, I'm not very technology I'm just a community guy :-)
Thats cool you will have to find someone who is ;) thanks for the updates keep them coming
thank you that would be good because all those TT game should be added to the overall total as well
Thanks.
I played and won a game as Malphite (on TT) yesterday (23rd) but was not accredited a point and as such have not received the 4 win ip boost :(
You're definitely going to get the boost. Just keep in mind the boosts don't appear instantly. It takes the systems a short while to process them so sit tight.
The 4 win ip boost is now showing for me in client, thankyou and have a good aussie weekend everyone {{item:3028}}

Same here as above, I won a TT with Nautilus on the 23rd when the points were still down at 30000. I login today and the point total is almost 130000. Yet it still says I have contributed 0 points and no ip boost. Might as well not bother if this is how its going to be.

Hello friend, so we're still looking into what we can do here but what we do know is that anyone who played under the ocean week conditions will definitely get the 4 win boost and other prizes. We're trying to retroactively update the scores to reflect this but whether we can or not you'll still get what you earned :)
so is Twisted tree line giving points now then ?
Yep it's all sweet now. It was just an hour or so yesterday
I love how my thread was hijacked, thanks guys.
Dude its what threads are about.
I know the TT queue is open atm, i've already played a couple of games, but it would be nice if it was open for the duration of the event.

TT is open atm, i won 2 games in TT but didnt get any Ocean week points from it.
Might be bugged atm.
